author: costin
msg: Get/Post tests:
- Fixed RST bug on Linux ( and other strict-TCP-implementations).
- Added more informations about what fails.

author: costin
msg: Fix for most of the failing product tests.
The fix is simple - finding what was actually failing is another story.

author: costin
msg: First chunk of changes in Request.
- Moved all code from Request to RequestImpl.
- Made Request an Interface
- minor change in getCookies() ( now return a Cookie[] instead of Vector,
to make the signature closer to HttpServlerRequest)
This is not the final step - Request is still too big to try to
implement it right now, and we might have some hidden deps.

author: craigmcc
msg: Clean up the internationalization issues by following the typical
Tomcat pattern of using a localized properties file via StringManager.
Implement the FileRealmDatabase.write() method by hard coding the
creation of XML data structures, as a placeholder until a parser
independent XML interface is available.

author: gonzo
msg: uri mapping (RequestMapper) check for null PathInfo
- apm.
added latest web.dtd from servlet 2.2/pr2 which
has removed the redundant "role-name" element
declaration which causes web application valiation
parsing exceptions - j2ee.
